title: Delta, Virgin Galactic, KB Home, Taiwan Semiconductor: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Earnings season is back. Delta Air Lines shares rose premarket after reporting quarterly results.
body:
U.S. stock futures wavered and bond yields rose as fresh data on inflation and the labor market were released. Here’s what we’re watching in Thursday’s trading:
Write to Caitlin Ostroff at caitlin.ostroff@wsj.com
